summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding a change in schedule for a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein. Amanda Kirby requests a fax number to complete an ISDA agreement, and Lesley Groff confirms a lunch meeting with Epstein.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, involved in writing up an ISDA agreement.

persons.name: Harry Beller I.
persons.context: Harry Beller I. is cc'd in the email and is asked to provide a fax number.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is the sender of the email who confirms the lunch meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is mentioned as the person with whom the meeting is scheduled.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby and Lesley Groff are colleagues communicating about a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.
Lesley Groff is coordinating a lunch meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.
Amanda Kirby is requesting a fax number from Harry Beller I., who is cc'd in the email.

events.title: Lunch Meeting with Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A lunch meeting is scheduled with Jeffrey Epstein at his home.

keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is working on an ISDA agreement and needs a fax number to complete it.
Lesley Groff confirms a lunch meeting with Jeffrey Epstein on October 4, 2013.
Harry Beller I. is included in the email chain for coordination purposes.
